Episodes.Title: Celebration
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Media magnate Logan Roy shocks his family with a stunning announcement on his 80th birthday. The news shatters his son Kendall, the heir apparent who's in the midst of negotiating the purchase of digital-media venture.

Episodes.Title: Sh*t Show at the F**k Factory
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Tony Roche, Susan Soon He Stanton
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: While Logan is in the hospital, tensions rise when backup plans should be made by the family.

Episodes.Title: Lifeboats
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Jonathan Glatzer, Susan Soon He Stanton
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: As their first act as CEO and COO, Ken and Roman try to dig the company out of a financial mess. Meanwhile, Marcia prevents the family from seeing the recovering Roy.

Episodes.Title: Sad Sack Wasp Trap
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Anna Jordan, Susan Soon He Stanton
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: The family attends an annual company gala overseen by Connor and highlighted by a surprise announcement.

Episodes.Title: I Went to Market
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Georgia Pritchett, Susan Soon He Stanton
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Kendall begins to plot a vote of no confidence against Logan; Tom questions his prenup.

Episodes.Title: Which Side Are You On?
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Susan Soon He Stanton
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Roman and Kendall attempt to sway the board, while Shiv explores her options in D.C.

Episodes.Title: Austerlitz
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Lucy Prebble, Susan Soon He Stanton
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: The Roys gather for a family therapy session; Kendall finds his sobriety tested.

Episodes.Title: Prague
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Jon Brown, Susan Soon He Stanton
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Tom has a bachelor's party to remember; Kendall and Roman eye new business opportunities.

Episodes.Title: Pre-Nuptial
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Susan Soon He Stanton
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: The Roys assemble at an English castle for Shiv's and Tom's wedding; Kendall's plans are fast-tracked.

Episodes.Title: Nobody Is Ever Missing
Episodes.Writer: Jesse Armstrong, Susan Soon He Stanton
Episodes.Actors: Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox
Episodes.Plot: Roman faces technical difficulties. Tom marks his territory. Kendall hits rock bottom with tragic consequences.
